subject: Re: Request for volunteer researcher assistance
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Tom,

Thanks!  I've sent you an e-mail to get your address.

- Mike C.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Tom Arnold <topgun0123@...> wrote:
>
> Mike,
>  My wife mother-inlaw and my self will help you do reserch.If you 
would like I have a digital recorder that I upload to the computer with 
no problem.
> Tom Millet (Northeast Ct Paranormal Society Founder)
